metadata.title: CVE-2012-6426 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
LemonLDAP::NG before 1.2.3 does not use the signature-verificationcapability of the Lasso library, which allows remote attackers to bypassintended access-control restrictions via crafted SAML data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6426` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemonldap-ng - 1.2.5-1
liblemonldap-ng-conf-perl - 1.2.5-1
liblemonldap-ng-handler-perl - 1.2.5-1
liblemonldap-ng-manager-perl - 1.2.5-1
liblemonldap-ng-portal-perl - 1.2.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.5-1').
